strings.roomAlreadyExists: :warning: You already have a room summoned somewhere!
strings.roomRevokedInactive: Your channel was revoked due to inactivity, You can resummon it with `c!summon`
strings.roomErrorDisabled: Private rooms are disabled on this guild.
strings.revokeError: :no_good: Something went wrong while revoking your room.
strings.revokeNotGuild: You can only revoke your room from a server.
strings.roomMadePublic: Anyone can now join your room.
strings.roomNotPublic: Only added members can join your room now.
strings.userWhitelistRevoke: $1 is no longer on your whitelist.
strings.userBlacklistRevoke: $1 is no longer on your blacklist.
strings.errorConfigNotFound: Something went wrong while fetching this guilds configuration.
strings.errorRoomsDisabled: Private Rooms are disabled on this guild.
strings.errorNotGuild: Rooms can only be summoned from a guild.
